title: FluidPay
description: FluidPay is a blockchain-powered payment system that utilizes the Superfluid protocol to simplify transactions. By generating QR codes for initiating and terminating payment streams, businesses can effortlessly enable users to pay on-the-go in tokens. With automatic stream cessation upon transaction completion, FluidPay eliminates the need for time tracking, enhancing user convenience and optimizing payment workflows for businesses.FluidPay is a blockchain-powered payment system that utilizes the Superfluid protocol to simplify transactions. By generating QR codes for initiating and terminating payment streams, businesses can effortlessly enable users to pay on-the-go in tokens. With automatic stream cessation upon transaction completion, FluidPay eliminates the need for time tracking, enhancing user convenience and optimizing payment workflows for businesses

title: Uniswap-clone
description: Uniswap-Clone is a project where I've successfully replicated and comprehensively grasped the functionality of Uniswap-V2. By cloning the contracts, interfaces, and SDK, subgraph, I've achieved a deep understanding of the platform's mechanics and how it facilitates decentralized token exchanges.
